DOC.brief_summary: The rate of obesity and bariatric surgery is rising steadily. Though Bariatric Surgery Influences on aspects such as endocrin analysis, finance, etc are well tested, quantitative and quality voice impacts have not been evaluated. The aim of the study is to recruit 50 patients who underwent bariatric surgery and compare voice quality in each of these patients before and after surgery.
DOC.brief_title: The Influence of Significant Weight Lost on the Quality of Voice
DOC.criteria: Morbid obese Candidates for bariatric Surgery History of benign \ malignant disease of the larynx. History of head and neck tumors History of radiation therapy of the neck BMI under 30 presurgery
